title: Manage Hazardous Materials Storage
description: A shipment of hazardous materials (e.g., flammable liquids) arrives and must be stored in a designated, compliant area.

tasks.description: During receiving, scan an item that the system identifies as a hazardous material.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the item as HAZMAT and displays its UN number and storage requirements.

tasks.description: The system directs the operator to a specific, segregated area of the warehouse designed for hazardous materials.
tasks.expected_outcome: The put-away task directs the operator to the HAZMAT cage.

tasks.description: The operator moves the item to the designated area and confirms the put-away, completing the compliant storage process.
tasks.expected_outcome: The HAZMAT item is stored safely and correctly.
